|rad1chip2 = RFMD;RF2959; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-TNC |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "3751-36100201" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos. "3762-16141005" and a date code of '''0441''' is silkscreened on the main board of a sample production unit's board. :"3761-36100202" and a date code of '''0440''' is silkscreened on the wireless module board. :The [[CyberTAN WGV614-A3]] (w/ omitted VoIP subsection) and the [[Linksys RT41P2-AT]] (w/ omitted miniPCI slot + wireless) appear to share the same board. '''[[CyberTAN]]''' is the presumed OEM of this device. {{WiFiCert|W002822|08/18/2004}} ==Links of Interest== ===Forum posts=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=3151 Primary '''DD-WRT''' Forum support thread] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=27957 Specs noted in another '''DD-WRT''' Forum thread] ===Internal shots=== *[http://zhmaozz.blog.163.com/blog/static/7259495220091241112698/ Internal shots on some Chinese blog] :The processor is part FWIXP425BC. *[http://www.topwifi.cn/bbs/thread-70-1-1.html Additional internal shot] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts====
